episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Arts, Culture & Digital Storytelling
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Arts, Culture & Digital Storytelling.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down [Quesnel Cariboo Observer] VIDEO: Vigil for Tumbler Ridge in Langley City and [The Guardian Global Development] ‘The goal has been to demystify’: how a colonial Nairobi library was restored and given back to the people, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into arts, culture & digital storytelling, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech optimist with an engineering background) and Casey (Community-first skeptic of tech promises).
